item.title: Why A Generated Site?
item.description: Some folks asked me why I decided to use a static site generator (Hugo) even though I make software including website professionally. At first pass it might seem like a good idea – why not take this opportunity to show off my web dev skillz.

item.title: DustCopter
item.description: In early 2021 I decided to see if I could program a drone to dust off my TV. I couldn’t… my house it too windy and the platform I chose (a DJI Tello drone) doesn’t afford me low-level enough control to compensate for it.

item.title: Greg's Site
item.description: Everything that Greg decided to put on his website is here
